sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; // import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Row, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './main.css'; import './about.css'; // import { ABOUT } from '../strings' export default class Recipes extends Component { render() { document.title = 'Recipes' return ( {/*

What I do

{ABOUT.technical}

{ABOUT.values}

*/}

My values

Christian

Before anything else, I am a Christian. That doesn't mean that I get to use church as an excuse to get out of things or that I can be condescending and judgemental. Rather, it means that I'll strive to glorify God through my behavior and speech, in accordance with biblical teachings such as in Gal. 5:22-23 (the Fruit of the Spirit) and Col. 3:12-17.

Honesty & Transparency

"A company runs on efficiency of communication" - Michael Scott, The Office.
Communication is critical for productive teamwork. Effective communication is that which is not only concise, but also truthful. And that's not just between co-workers, but also in manager-employee relationships. I'll try to always be open about work progress and obstacles!

Life outside of work

Finance & Investing

I enjoy reading up on the current events and tracking the stock market. If I weren't studying computer science, I think I would be an econ major. It's fascinating to see how everything is interdependent and it must all be balanced so carefully.

Dogs

I used to be terrified of dogs, because my friend's dog chased me across my elementary school's lawn in third grade. Fortunately, I was able to see the error of my ways, and I love dogs now. Samoyeds are my favorite because they always have a smile on their faces!

Basketball

My favorite sport. Football, soccer, volleyball are fun, but I grew up playing basketball with my dad. I usually play guard and tend to stick around the perimeter to provide spacing (I'm not good playing in the paint) I'm a big Boston Celtics fan.

Guitar

I'm trying to learn guitar! I grew up with piano, but stopped in high school. After discovering that playing the ukelele was fun, I wanted to try the guitar.

Food

I like eating! And cooking, but I'm not nearly as good at that. I want to learn and practice cooking, and so I recently started grilling stuff. First two tries were... not great. But I'm getting better!

The Office

I love The Office. I watch other shows as well, but I keep coming back to this show. 7 times to be exact. It's hilarious, the story is great, and the characters are likeable. Too bad it's leaving Netflix...

Reading

I read a lot growing up, but I sort of stopped in high school. Then I found the Stormlight Archive books. They're thick, but the story is so rich and well-built. If you're looking for something to read, I would highly recommend it!

 ) } }
